text: Edward Vincent "Eddie" Bracken (February 7, 1915 - November 14, 2002) was an American movie, television, stage, radio, voice actor, and comedian. He was known for his roles in The Miracle of Morgan's Creek, Fun on a Week-end, Baby's Day Out, Home Alone 2: Lost in New York, and in We're Not Married!. Bracken was born on February 7, 1915 in Queens, New York.Eddie Bracken Biography (1915-2002) at filmreference.com He was married to Connie Nickerson from 1939 until her death in 2002. They had five children. Bracken died on November 14, 2002 in Glen Ridge, New Jersey after going into surgery, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1915 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American radio actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Television personalities from New York City Category:American radio personalities Category:Actors from New York City
title: Eddie Bracken
